duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute and support centralized operational HR business processes including pre-hire, onboarding, offboarding, education, and certification reimbursement programs.
Monitor and report on HR administrative tasks and talent program administration, such as performance management and compliance surveys.
Respond to employment verification, legal requests, and maintain service queue through HR applications.
Assist Talent Service Desk as Tier 2 support and provide excellent customer service to employees and team members.
Collaborate within and outside the team to ensure an integrated approach to the Talent experience.
Communicate with HRSS Lead on productivity, quality & availability, and identify operational issues for process improvements.
Manage a high volume of inquiries and respond in a timely manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources or related field
